reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: FELM?s partner Tanganyika Christian Refugee Service, TCRS implements a large human rights based country program in various parts of Tanzania. To uphold and develop further the good quality of her work the organization needs upgraded knowledge of developmen t trends as well as motivated and committed staff. Staff training is a crucial tool to reach this aim. In TCRS Capacity building project, the staff is trained in administration, financial management, fund raising and cross-cutting themes. As results of the project, the staff management skills improve, fund raising of the organization develops, knowledge of the rights of the most vulnerable groups increase. The improved capacity of the staff benefits the organization as well as all the beneficiaries the orga nization serves.
